ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectFormaldehyde Emissions from Composite Wood Products Regulations
PrecisFORMALDEHYDE EMISSIONS FROM COMPOSITE WOOD PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to place limits on the allowable formaldehyde emissions from composite wood products imported into or sold in Canada.
